name: Grey Rainbow
description:
**BEST PLAYED ON PHONE**

-- Drag and Drop every picture on the corresponding color.

Luc ABEILLE (alias quartzgolem) - Conception, Programming, Music, Sounds

Aralorn - Conception, Art

Qrow - Conception, Design & UI

Theanael - Main Playtesting & feedback

Game made within 3 days for the Impossijam game jam.

Theme was : Black & White AND colour is the key.

Character faces and cars designed by Freepik
